mapper.select: SELECT dcedi.* FROM devops_cicd_pipeline dcp INNER JOIN devops_cd_job dcj ON (dcj.pipeline_id = dcp.id AND dcj.type = 'cdDeploy') INNER JOIN devops_cd_env_deploy_info dcedi ON dcedi.id = dcj.deploy_info_id WHERE dcedi.value_id = #{valueId}
